name: Indy 4
summary:
Indy 4 is a 4 player arcade game by Atari, originally released in 1976. It was preceded by its larger 8 player counterpart, Indy 800, in 1975.

Gameplay is a simulation of an Indianapolis 500 style of race, in which players compete by racing each other with simulated IndyCar race cars. The player cars' colors are light blue, green, red, and dark blue.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: 驾驶模拟
  • 游玩人数: 4人
  • 发行日期: 1976年5月
